result.arabic_text: لَيۡسَ لَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَمۡرِ شَيۡءٌ أَوۡ يَتُوبَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَوۡ يُعَذِّبَهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ ظَٰلِمُونَ
result.translation: 128. Nabiyow Seehadâ caagidik tu- kol matan, cagalah ken caagid Yallih gabat yani ikkal, hinnay usun Yallal gacaanaah Yalli toobat keenik oggolah, hinnay koroosannuk kate weenik Yalli ken digaale-le, Diggah usun sinni nafsi koroosannut yudlume mara yekkeenimih Sabbatah.
